question: The targets from fifth five year plan are setÂ  with respect to which of the following parameters?
option3: Gross Domestic Product at Factor Cost
option4: Gross Domestic Product at Market Cost
answer: Gross Domestic Product at Factor Cost
explanation:
Targets for the first three plans were set with respect to National Income.
Fourth Plan it was Net Domestic Product.
In all Plans thereafter it has been Gross Domestic Product at factor cost.
